text: Adventure in Manhattan is a 1936 American thriller movie directed by Edward Ludwig and starring Jean Arthur, Joel McCrea, Reginald Owen, Thomas Mitchell, Victor Kilian, John Gallaudet, Emmett Vogan, Robert Warwick. It was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1936 movies Category:1930s thriller movies Category:American thriller movies Category:Movies directed by Edward Ludwig
title: Adventure in Manhattan
